title: I am a bronze player and cant get out.  Help me!  My teams are absolute trash every single game.
body:
I hate this elo.  I cant win a single game.

I get feeders and afkers all day.

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Add1ctd


Someone help me

replies.body: play better, bronze is an absolute joke

Well instead of bagging your team mates maybe try helping them, if you see one of your team mates if struggling in lane then go and help em out, and as long as you do good then it's fine, idc if I win or lose I'm happy if I atleast did well
Also try queuing with friends or people on the same skill level than you
From the looks of it you should just draven or dodge.

> From the looks of it you should just draven or dodge.

I cant always get draven tho

> Hahaha typical Bronze player

this isnt helpful
Focus on your own gameplay (focus on improving it if you suck). Pick champions you know you can hard carry with, then lead the team with your own plays.
